example: Footprint after rain read as cause.
No tool found yet cause assumed.
No crumbs in bin equals no food.
Bleached sink read as clean life.
Dog did not alert therefore none.
Cut from slip read self harm.
Print on cloth read as clear.
Blue cast read as blue wall.
Glitter from handshake seen as visit.
Fiber from shared locker seen as visit.
Hair from bus seat seen as entry.
Dust from toolbox seen as arrival.
Cup near note read as code.
Metal dust on machinist read as guilt.
Paint on decorator read as link.
Flour on baker read as scene.
Graphite on artist read as link.
Paint and soil tied as one chain.
Ink and ash fused in tale.
